name: EndAbTestSelectWinner
description:
End an active A/B test and designate a winner.

Use this tool to end an ongoing A/B test for landing pages and select the winning variant. Ideal for finalizing tests and applying successful strategies.

parameters.name: winner_object_id
parameters.description: ID of the landing page variant to designate as the winner of the A/B test.

value_schema.description: ID of the object to designate as the test winner.

parameters.name: test_id_to_end
parameters.description: ID of the A/B test to be ended.

value_schema.description: ID of the test to end.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: winnerId
parameters.description: ID of the object to designate as the test winner.

value_schema.description: ID of the object to designate as the test winner.

parameters.name: abTestId
parameters.description: ID of the test to end.

value_schema.description: ID of the test to end.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
